component.name: ReDoomEd
component.summary: Doom game map editor, ported from id Software's DoomEd for NeXTSTEP

description.p: ReDoomEd is a port of DoomEd, id Software's Doom map editor for NeXTSTEP OS that was used to design the levels of the original Doom games.

ReDoomEd is built from the publicly-released NeXTSTEP source-code for DoomEd & doombsp (command-line tool), with additions & modifications in order to run on Cocoa. (Cocoa is the native application programming interface for Mac OS X, the modern successor to NeXTSTEP. Cocoa is also supported on other platforms via the GNUstep framework).
